RadPlusWidgetSQLMulti.title: CCS Financial Eligibility Widget
RadPlusWidgetSQLMulti.sqlcode1:
SELECT 'PATIENT500' as OPTIONNAME <HIDE:OPTIONNAME>, bgd.S_INDEX as "ID" <HIDE:ID>, bgd.PATID as "PATID" <HIDE:PATID>, bgd.FACILITY as "FACILITY" <HIDE:FACILITY>, bgd.EPISODE_NUMBER as "EPN" <HIDE:EPN>, bged.cov_effective_date as "ALIAS" <HIDE:ALIAS>,
bged.cov_effective_date as "Effective Date" <LINK:OPTIONNAME:PATID:ID:EPN::ALIAS>, string(bgt.guarantor_name, ' / ', bgt.GUARANTOR_ID) as "Guarantor Name / Number", bgsd.subs_policy as "Subscriber #"
FROM billing_guar_data bgd JOIN billing_guar_emp_data bged ON bgd.FACILITY = bged.FACILITY AND bgd.PATID = bged.PATID AND bgd.S_INDEX = bged.S_INDEX AND bgd.GUARANTOR_ID = bged.GUARANTOR_ID JOIN SYSTEM.billing_guar_table bgt ON bgd.FACILITY = bgt.FACILITY AND bgd.GUARANTOR_ID = bgt.GUARANTOR_ID JOIN SYSTEM.billing_guar_subs_data bgsd ON bgd.FACILITY = bgsd.FACILITY AND bgd.PATID = bgsd.PATID AND bgd.S_INDEX = bgsd.S_INDEX AND bgd.GUARANTOR_ID = bgsd.GUARANTOR_ID JOIN SYSTEM.episode_history eh ON bgd.FACILITY = eh.FACILITY AND bgd.PATID = eh.PATID AND bgd.EPISODE_NUMBER = eh.EPISODE_NUMBER
WHERE
bgd.FACILITY = ?FACILITY AND bgd.PATID = ?PATID AND (?EPID = '' OR bgd.EPISODE_NUMBER = ?EPID) AND eh.program_code IN ('4000','4050')
ORDER BY bgsd.guarantor_order, bged.cov_effective_date
